about_the_game: Immerse yourself in fantasy adventures with the Abalon Soundtrack! Passionately composed by Albert Ventura, the music of Abalon is a stunning combination of whimsical exploration, atmospheric ambience, intense battle tracks, and charming encounters - much like the game itself! These scores are the perfect companion for your tabletop RPG get togethers, inspiring your next big D&D campaign, or just relaxing and regaling on your past adventures in the world of Abalon. Sit back and enjoy!
